title: "What were the experiences of Monsieur Donato's magnetism on various individuals in the 19th century?"
first_phrase: In the previous text, Monsieur Donato's mesmerizing abilities were described in detail, and three individuals shared their personal experiences with him. In the last part (200 tokens), Monsieur Donato received a letter from E.K. who had been mesmerized by him before and requested to be included in his work using only their initials. Another letter came from P. Démarchant who allowed Monsieur Donato to publish his experiences of being unable to move and imitating Donato's actions while being mesmerized. Lastly, Y. Lagniez expressed his surprise at being mesmerized for the first time by Monsieur Donato.
